title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. I, subch. C, pt. 4217 - The Daily Double And Other Pools
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. I, subch. C, pt. 4217 - The Daily Double And Other Pools

State Regulations

The Daily Double (§ 4217.1 to 4217.9)

The Quinella (§ 4217.10 to 4217.11)

Exacta (§ 4217.13 to 4217.14)

Special Betting Races (§ 4217.15 to 4217.16)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. T, ch. I, subch. C, pt. 4217

Statutory authority: L. 1970, ch. 1023; Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and Breeding Law, §§ 101, 227, 228, 305, 405

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
